name: Package Delivery Simulator
description:
Oh no! Your family went into poverty, and you need money! Deliver packages fast and don't get fired!

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Pick up/throw packages

Space - Jump

My submission for the 2021 Jamulator!

--- CREDITS ---

Sound effects taken from www.zapsplat.com

Music by TeknoAXE: 

All 3D assets and programming were done by me (apart from following a few tutorials brackeys is god)
